title: Mobile Phone Activated Remote Control Patents Available from ICAP Patent Brokerage
text:
ICAP Patent Brokerage announces for sale patents disclosing a device which allows a mobile smart phone to control any other device, available from TIP Solutions, Inc. This portfolio is offered as part of the Internet of Things IP Auction, with a bidding deadline of November 12th, 2015.
NEW YORK, NY
ICAP Patent Brokerage announces for sale patents disclosing a device which allows a mobile smart phone to control any other device, available from TIP Solutions, Inc. This portfolio is offered as part of the Internet of Things IP Auction , with a bidding deadline of November 12th, 2015.
“This technology allows secure remote control of virtually any device, from any location,” said Dean Becker, CEO of ICAP Patent Brokerage. “Using just their mobile phone, users can fully operate and automate their homes, vehicles, and other possessions.”
Key Characteristics & Benefits
The invention discloses a device for controlling devices from a smart device (e.g. mobile phone or tablet). The invention utilizes the Electronic Serial Number (ESN) and/or the Mobile Identification Number (MIN) to securely transmit a code to a receiver, which reads the code and initiates an automated process. This ensures only known, authorized devices can access the system. The invention can be used to control any electrically enabled device, such as a garage door system, house locks and lights, automobile accessories, or any device on a wireless network (Cellular, Wifi, Bluetooth, NFC, Zigbee, etc).
See the technical description of the device control IP sales offering.
